title: 如何让玩家无法创建/召唤Shopkeepers
author: LiKa233
txt_content: 如题，玩家甚至可以用工具召唤或者收回

replies.author: 90328xiaohuo
replies.txt_content: 那应该是你的权限组出问题了！

replies.author: Brave_boy
replies.txt_content:
在服务器输入
/mangcheckp Builder shopkeeper.*
和 /mangcheckp Default shopkeeper.*
然后将反馈发来

或者输入/manglistp Builder 和 /manglistp Default 也可以 最好这个

replies.author: LiKa233
replies.txt_content:
Brave_boy 发表于 2019-8-1 04:11
在服务器输入
/mangcheckp Builder shopkeeper.*
和 /mangcheckp Default shopkeeper.*
默认权限组为Builder

replies.author: Brave_boy
replies.txt_content:
LiKa233 发表于 2019-8-1 17:43
默认权限组为Builder
/mangaddp Builder -shopkeeper.*
输入一下试试

replies.author: LiKa233
replies.txt_content:
Brave_boy 发表于 2019-8-1 19:31
/mangaddp Builder -shopkeeper.*
输入一下试试
但似乎shopkeeper下包括交互的子权限，我便添加了以下负权限，暂时还没测试。
